title: Create a Lookalike Audience
description: A media buyer wants to find new customers by creating a lookalike audience based on their existing customer list.

tasks.description: Upload a list of existing customer emails to the ad platform to create a custom audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the source custom audience.

tasks.description: Use the custom audience as a seed to create a 1% lookalike audience in a specific country.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ad platform generates a new, larger audience of users who are similar to the existing customers.

tasks.description: Target the new lookalike audience in a prospecting campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent launches a campaign to reach potential new customers.
